ThingDef.label: bee genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of bee genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used only as a primary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All bee hybrids hover over terrain.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table from a combination of 10 bees.
